Reviews.Content: ok location isnt dodgy wish bothered photos complete opposite reviewed bathroom clean tidy fault 5 star definitely worst stayed trip europe bus stop intersection closest hotel vatican 10 minute ride metro close strike day day stayed night prebooked hotel centre city didnt mind

Reviews.Content: unfortunate experience staying 3 nights horrific establishment tour time ready cancel tour completely travel independently hotel located described ghetto decent food shops significant distance stunk cramped air conditioning day night disturbed sirens passing emergency vehicles matters worse staff possibly unhelpful ive experienced wireless internet system internet cafes walking distance alternative arrangements tour despite paid night tour suggest alternative arrangements
